skillTree.localised_description: A general's horse can be their most trusted and daring companion. Just don't name him 'Daisy'.

skillTree.localised_description: What the peasants really want, whether they know so or not, is a strong man; a man with will of iron so strong that death itself runs in his wake.

skillTree.localised_description: There's nothing quite like a pious Kislevite man scorned, especially one whose rage is stoked by the finest kvas.

skillTree.localised_description: If Kislev and its people are to endure then they must fight to the death, lest the foe take all for which they have strived.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.

	(enemy armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: Frail as they may seem, there is no doubt the Gods guide the Patriarch's arm, and lend him their strength in defence of the Motherland.
There is nothing but utter belief. There is no reasoning with this one.
"Don't look into their eyes, there is only death there!"
Such is this one's conviction that others have no choice but to believe.
Speaking words of power or faith can alter perceptions on the battlefield.
Kostaltynâ€™s flat metal discs, inscribed with Ursunâ€™s runes and icons, inspire even greater deeds when awarded to the worthy.
This one will not go down easily - it will be necessary to break both the will and the body first.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
This one fights with a fervour to be both admired and despised.
The longer you believe, the more intense that faith becomes. When your belief is total, there is nothing that you cannot achieve.

skillTree.localised_description: "Death is like a winter chill; No door can keep it from us; And summer yet may bloom againThough ice be all upon us."

skillTree.localised_description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.
This Lord expects utter obedience from the smallfolk, and has little time for insurrections or petty revolts.
Revered by the masses, such a celebrated leader will inspire many new recruits.

skillTree.localised_description: A good quartermaster can ration equipment and foodstuffs efficiently, making supplies last longer.
Proficient with figures, this Lord, or his subordinates, can keep his army fulfilled, even in dire circumstances.
Countless conflicts and a keen sense of awareness have made this Lord difficult to entrap.
